def_cn: 讲究的;一丝不苟的;注重细节的
def_en: If you say that someone is fastidious, you mean that they pay great attention to detail because they like everything to be very neat, accurate, and in good order.

def_cn: 过分讲究整洁的;有洁癖的
def_en: If you say that someone is fastidious, you mean that they are concerned about keeping clean to an extent that many people consider to be excessive.
